cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.SD 

Reasoning: The paper discusses representation learning in the context of natural language processing, which is a core topic in the field of computational linguistics (cs.CL). The proposed method, the essence vector (EV) model, is an unsupervised paragraph embedding method, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also mentions applications such as sentiment classification and document summarization, which are related to information retrieval (cs.IR) and semantic analysis (cs.SD).
